metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8598 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in the zmq interface in csp_if_zmqhub.c in the libcsp library v1.4 and earlier allows hostile computers connected via a zmq interface to execute arbitrary code via a long packet.

criterions.comment: libcsp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
